version_name: 2.1.7- Add new character Mistra - The Archer- Release Trick Game in Mode- More AWESOME Costume- Fix bugs and optimize gameWe're working hard to improve this game. Hope you enjoy Stickman Legends

version_description:
Stickman Legends: BIG UPDATE
- Change all game UI
- Add new character Ignite – the Gunner
- More new cool skin
- Rebalancing

Stickman Legends
Version 2.1.7
- Add new character Mistra - The Archer
- Release Trick Game in Mode
- More AWESOME Costume
- Fix bugs and optimize game
We're working hard to improve this game. Hope you enjoy Stickman Legends, keep suppor

Stickman Legends - Version 2.1.8
- Add "Leaderboard" in Survival, Trick Game and Campaign mode.
- Fixed bugs and optimized game
We're working hard to improve this game. Hope you enjoy Stickman Legends, keep supporting and giving us feedback!

- Open Christmas Event!
- All Character and Costume now can buy with Gem!
- Double the amount of Gem you buy.
- Upgrade equipment with gems now will be limited equal your character level plus 10.

On occasion of Black Friday 2018, we serve lots of awesome sale-off offers for Black Friday event in this update version 2.3.36!

Thanks for playing!

- Updated & customized bundles for newbie.

The update includes new content and the following changes:
- Release Rebirth System: when level of character and equipment reached max level 500, you get a rebirth to take the power of Gods
- Add 2 new features in Campaign: Auto Next Battle and Repe

- Introducing the Pet System.
- Changing Daily Mission's condition: Win 3 PVP matches -> Play 3 PVP matches (no winning required).
- User's HP in Arena will be changed from x10 to x5.
- Auto in PVP is now available.
- Changing stamina cost

- 介绍宠物系统。
- 改变每日任务的条件：赢得3场PVP比赛 - >参加3场PVP比赛（不需要获胜）。
- 用户在竞技场中的HP将从x10更改为x5。
- PVP中的自动功能现已推出。
- 将阶段的耐力成本改回到之前。
- VIP每日套餐中的x10金额。
- 特技模式下宝石掉落率增加：3％ - > 5％
- 现在第三次重生将解锁，有了第二个上帝的祝福（重生的buff）。
- 第一个上帝祝福（重生增益效果）效果将在每个级别增加

The following bugs are fixed in this update:
1. Exp in Tricky mode display issue
2. Change the win-lose conditions in Ladder + Duel mode (the opponent's HP must be down to 0)
3. Gold display issue in the Exchange event
4. Show Materials + Rece

1. 添加团队战斗模式，本地的管理者可以创建5v5锦标赛。
2. 调整一些配件:
-圣杯:每5秒增加一次属性->每10秒增加一次属性。最多15个堆叠->最多20个堆叠。
-克斯卡利伯，古吉尔，混沌之剑，乌鸦角色的宠物乌鸦不再减少他们的效果。
伯纳尔德之锤风暴:持续时间从5秒增加到7秒。
- 记忆指环 (伯纳德的个人配件)在HP低于30%(之前:低于10%)时激活，持续时间从10s增加到15s
-所罗门之书召唤的怪物:移动速度从5增加到6，暴击率从
